title: We need new champions with a simple kit
body:
I don't mean easy or low skillfloor/skillcap. They aren't the same thing.

{{champion:92}} is a simple champ with a high skillcap
{{champion:86}} is a simple champ with a low skillcap

Simple kit means that they don't have too much going on, like how Ekko has his ult, his Q, etc

all the simple champs seem to be older champs like {{champion:5}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:19}}
